text: I'm looking for a gastropub restaurant in Cambridge. What's a good option?

You should try The Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar! It's a gastropub located in the city centre, serving up delicious food with a signature dish like the Wasabi Spiked Hamburger. Give them a call to book a table, and don't forget to mention you're a Cambridge TownInfo Centre user - just use reservation number 5421. Phone number is 01223308871. Enjoy your meal!
I'd like to get the exact address of The Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar. What's the address?
The Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar is located at Corn Exchange Street in the city centre. The postcode is CB2 3QF.

I've got the address: Corn Exchange Street, CB2 3QF. That's perfect. Thank you for your help!

END
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Have a great time at The Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar! Don't forget to mention your reservation number 5421 when you book your table.

I won't forget! Thank you again for your help. Goodbye!

END
Goodbye! Have a great day in Cambridge!
